name: FAQ on National Eviction Moratorium provided by the National Low Income Housing Coalition (NLIHC)
note: This page provides an explanation of the eviciton moratorium (effective Sept. 4th, 2020 to Dec. 31st, 2020) issued by the Center for Disease Control (CDC). It also provides a links to a number of resources including a downloadable Declaration of Eligibility (in multiple languages) to be completed, signed, and mailed by tenants to their landlord as the first step to invoking their right to the protections of this moratorium.
